snippet: James Cameron, the film director, plans to get into a capsule and plummet, alone, down nearly seven miles to the planet’s most inaccessible spot: the Challenger Deep in the western Pacific.
abstract: James Cameron, the film director, plans to get into a capsule and plummet, alone, down nearly seven miles to the planet’s most inaccessible spot, the Challenger Deep in the western Pacific; he plans to film what is an alien world thought to swarm with bizarre eels and worms, fish and crustaceans in his own miniature submarine.
lead_paragraph: James Cameron, the film director, plans to get into a capsule and plummet, alone, down nearly seven miles to the planet’s most inaccessible spot: the Challenger Deep in the western Pacific.

headline.seo: James Cameron Prepares to Dive Into Mariana Trench
headline.main: Miles Under the Pacific, a Director Will Take On His Riskiest Project
headline.print_headline: Miles Under the Pacific, A Director Will Take On His Most Risky Project
